product_title: Semiprecious Stone Round Drop Pendant Necklace
product_details_and_care:
Accented in a setting of finely ribbed vermeil wiring, a beautifully faceted triplet amplifies the natural beauty of three different stones to create a shimmering centerpiece for this versatile necklace.
16" length; 2" extender; 1/2" drop.
Spring-ring closure.
Sterling silver with 18k-gold plate/mother-of-pearl, quartz and lapis triplet.
By Anna Beck; handcrafted in Bali.
Item #5104920_6
